timeline.bodyText: we can probably just have this set to visible in the layout file itself?

replies.bodyText: I have to verify if this is not set to visible somewhere else, e.g. when group shares, etc.

timeline.bodyText: if always visible we don't need the call at all

timeline.bodyText: in case it is always supported now: drop the parameter completely
